info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 7:33PM CST until December 28 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and western Arkansas. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
